000550.SZ.summary: Jiangling Motors Corporation, Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, develops, assembles, manufactures, and sells automobiles, engines and automobile related parts, and dies and tools in China and internationally. Its products include commercial vehicles, light trucks, heavy trucks, pickup and light buses, SUVs, and MPVs, as well as light EVI trucks and buses, and other products. The company also produces and sells engines, castings, and other components. Jiangling Motors Corporation, Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Nanchang, China.

000572.SZ.summary: Haima Automobile Co.,Ltd researches and develops, designs, manufactures, and sells automobiles in China. The company's product portfolio includes cars, SUVs, MPVs, new energy and electric vehicles, as well as powertrain products. It also exports its products to Egypt, Chile, the Philippines, Vietnam, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Haima Automobile Group Co.,Ltd. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Haikou, China.

000625.SZ.summary: Chongqing Changan Automobile Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells automobiles, automobile engines, and supporting parts primarily in the People's Republic of China. Its products include passenger, sedan, MPV, SUV, cross-passenger, and EV cars. The company was founded in 1862 and is based in Chongqing, the People's Republic of China.

000800.SZ.summary: FAW Jiefang Group Co., Ltd develops, manufactures, and sells passenger cars and accessories. The company was formerly known as Faw Car Co., Ltd. and changed its name to FAW Jiefang Group Co., Ltd in May 2020. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Changchun, China. FAW Jiefang Group Co., Ltd is a subsidiary of China First Automobile Co., Ltd.

000803.SZ.summary: BECE Legend Group Co., Ltd. produces and sells silk in China. It also develops real estate properties; and provides property management services. In addition, the company engages in automotive trade business; and the provision of post-market services. BECE Legend Group Co., Ltd. has a strategic cooperation agreement with New Concepts Holdings Limited to jointly develop projects through various modes of cooperation, including BOT, EPC, and technology development, as well as manufacture of related equipment. The company was formerly known as Sichuan Jinyu Automobile City (Group) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to BECE Legend Group Co., Ltd. in August 2020. BECE Legend Group Co., Ltd. is based in Nanchong, China.

000868.SZ.summary: Anhui Ankai Automobile Co., Ltd manufactures and sells large, medium, and light buses and automotive parts in China. The company offers various coaches, city buses, school buses, and new energy buses. It exports its products to Hong Kong, Macau, Singapore, Malaysia, the United Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia, the United Kingdom, Russia, the United States, Australia, Colombia, Ghana, and internationally. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Hefei, China. Anhui Ankai Automobile Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Anhui Jianghuai Automobile Co., Ltd.

000913.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Qianjiang Motorcycle Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of motorcycles, engines, and components in China and internationally. The company also offers racing cars and scooters. It provides its products under the Qianjiang Motorcycle, Benelli, Keeway, and KSR brands. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Wenling, China.

000957.SZ.summary: Zhongtong Bus Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells buses in China. It offers coaches, city buses, group buses, electric buses, stock buses, and luxury business buses, as well as public and tourist buses, highway buses, and school buses. The company also exports its products to approximately 90 countries and regions. Zhongtong Bus Co.,Ltd. was formerly known as Zhongtong Bus Holding Co.,ltd. and changed its name to Zhongtong Bus Co.,Ltd. in January 2021. Zhongtong Bus Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Liaocheng, China.

002682.SZ.summary: Longzhou Group Co., Ltd. primarily engages in the road transportation business in China. The company is also involved in the operation of passenger terminal; modern logistics activities; sale and maintenance of cars; and sale of oil and gas, as well as passenger transport. As of June 30, 2018, it had 36 passenger stations, 843 passenger lines, and 2928 passenger vehicles, including 1569 passenger buses, 135 coaches, 609 buses, and 615 taxis. The company was formerly known as Fujian Longzhou Transportation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Longzhou Group Co., Ltd. August 2018. Longzhou Group Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Longyan, China.

002865.SZ.long_name: Hainan Drinda Automotive Trim Co., Ltd
002865.SZ.summary: Hainan Drinda Automotive Trim Co., Ltd researches, develops, produces, and markets automotive plastic interior and exterior trim parts. Its principal products include dashboards, bumpers, door panels and guards, assembly products, and other accessories. The company is based in Haikou, China.

02G.F.summary: Guangzhou Automobile Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of vehicles and motorcycles, and parts and components; and provision of commercial and financial services in Mainland China and Hong Kong. The company operates through two segments, Vehicles and Related Operations, and Others. It offers large to medium sized passenger vehicles, light and heavy trucks, construction vehicles, and energy vehicles; motorcycles comprising standard motorcycles, sport bikes, scooters, etc.; and auto-parts and components, including engines, gearboxes, car seats, HVAC systems, auto lamps, automation accessories, redirectors, shock absorbers, and accessories. The company also provides financial investment, insurance, insurance broker, financial lease, automobile credit, and other related services; and engages in the businesses of vehicle sales, logistics, international trading, second-hand vehicles, disassembling, resources recycling, supporting services, etc. In addition, it offers investment management services; and engages in the trade of steel. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China. Guangzhou Automobile Group Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Guangzhou Automobile Industry Group Co., Ltd.

0O9.F.summary: Niu Technologies designs, manufactures, and sells smart electric-scooters in the People's Republic of China. The company offers NQi, MQi, UQi, and Gova series e-scooters; RQi and TQi series urban commuter electric motorcycles; NIU Aero series professional mountain and road bicycles; and NIU kick-scooter series kick-scooter and other micro-mobility solutions under the NIU brand name. It also provides scooter accessories, such as raincoats, gloves, knee pads, storage baskets and tail boxes, smart phone holders, backrests, and locks; lifestyle accessories, which includes T-shirts, coats, jeans, hats, bags, jewelry, notebook, badges, key chain, and mugs; and performance upgrade components that comprises of upgraded wheels, shock absorbers, brake calipers, and carbon fiber body panels. In addition, the company, through its NIU app, offers online repair request, DIY repairs, service station locator, theft reporting, and smart services, as well as NIU cover, which provides insurance services; NIU Care that offers maintenance service and reserve service in offline service stations; and NIU Wash offers free wash coupon on a monthly basis. The company sells and services its products through city partners and franchised stores, and third-party e-commerce platforms and the company's online store. As of December 31, 2020, it operated through 246 city partners and 1,616 franchised stores in approximately 199 cities in the People's Republic of China; and 36 distributors in 46 countries internationally. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

1211.HK.summary: BYD Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of automobiles and related products worldwide. It operates through three segments: Rechargeable Battery and Photovoltaic Products; Mobile Handset Components and Assembly Service; and Automobiles and Related Products. The company offers internal combustion, hybrid, and battery-electric passenger vehicles; buses, coaches, and taxis; logistics, construction, and sanitation vehicles; and vehicles for warehousing, port, airport, and mining operations. It also manufactures and sells lithium-ion and nickel batteries, photovoltaic products, and iron batteries primarily for mobile phones, electric tools, and other portable electronic instruments; mobile handset components, such as housings and keypads; and automobiles, and auto-related molds and components, as well as provides assembly, and automobiles leasing and after sales services. In addition, it offers rail transit equipment; consumer electronics; and solar batteries and arrays, as well as involved in the urban rail transportation business. BYD Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

1585.HK.summary: Yadea Group Holdings Ltd., an investment holding company, researches, develops, manufactures, distributes, and sells electric two wheeled vehicles and related accessories in the People's Republic of China. The company offers electric scooters, electric bicycles, and batteries and chargers, as well as other electric two-wheeled vehicles parts. It also provides e-commerce of electric vehicles and accessories and management consultancy services. The company exports its products in approximately 80 countries. Yadea Group Holdings Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Wuxi, the People's Republic of China.

1958.HK.summary: BAIC Motor Corporation Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells passenger vehicles in the People's Republic of China. The company provides luxury passenger cars, luxury commercial vehicles, middle-end and high-end passenger cars, and self-owned passenger cars, as well as electric passenger cars. It also provides auto engines, and powertrain and other parts and components. The company sells its products under the Beijing Brand, Beijing Benz, Beijing Hyundai, and Fujian Benz names. It is also involved in the car financing and automobile after-sales businesses, as well as investment management business. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

200550.SZ.summary: Jiangling Motors Corporation, Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, develops, assembles, manufactures, and sells automobiles, engines and automobile related parts, and dies and tools in China and internationally. Its products include commercial vehicles, light trucks, heavy trucks, pickup and light buses, SUVs, and MPVs, as well as light EVI trucks and buses, and other products. The company also produces and sells engines, castings, and other components. Jiangling Motors Corporation, Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Nanchang, China.

200625.SZ.summary: Chongqing Changan Automobile Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells automobiles, automobile engines, and supporting parts primarily in the People's Republic of China. Its products include passenger, sedan, MPV, SUV, cross-passenger, and EV cars. The company was founded in 1862 and is based in Chongqing, the People's Republic of China.

2238.HK.summary: Guangzhou Automobile Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of vehicles and motorcycles, and parts and components; and provision of commercial and financial services in Mainland China and Hong Kong. The company operates through two segments, Vehicles and Related Operations, and Others. It offers large to medium sized passenger vehicles, light and heavy trucks, construction vehicles, and energy vehicles; motorcycles comprising standard motorcycles, sport bikes, scooters, etc.; and auto-parts and components, including engines, gearboxes, car seats, HVAC systems, auto lamps, automation accessories, redirectors, shock absorbers, and accessories. The company also provides financial investment, insurance, insurance broker, financial lease, automobile credit, and other related services; and engages in the businesses of vehicle sales, logistics, international trading, second-hand vehicles, disassembling, resources recycling, supporting services, etc. In addition, it offers investment management services; and engages in the trade of steel. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China. Guangzhou Automobile Group Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Guangzhou Automobile Industry Group Co., Ltd.

2B5.F.summary: BAIC Motor Corporation Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells passenger vehicles in the People's Republic of China. The company provides luxury passenger cars, luxury commercial vehicles, middle-end and high-end passenger cars, and self-owned passenger cars, as well as electric passenger cars. It also provides auto engines, and powertrain and other parts and components. The company sells its products under the Beijing Brand, Beijing Benz, Beijing Hyundai, and Fujian Benz names. It is also involved in the car financing and automobile after-sales businesses, as well as investment management business. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

2B5.VI.summary: BAIC Motor Corporation Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells passenger vehicles in the People's Republic of China. The company provides luxury passenger cars, luxury commercial vehicles, middle-end and high-end passenger cars, and self-owned passenger cars, as well as electric passenger cars. It also provides auto engines, and powertrain and other parts and components. The company sells its products under the Beijing Brand, Beijing Benz, Beijing Hyundai, and Fujian Benz names. It is also involved in the car financing and automobile after-sales businesses, as well as investment management business. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

300210.SZ.long_name: Anshan Senyuan Road and Bridge Co., Ltd
300210.SZ.summary: Anshan Senyuan Road and Bridge Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells road maintenance equipment China. The company provides snow removal and cleaning equipment, asphalt pavement in place regeneration equipment, and preventive maintenance equipment. It also offers asphalt and cement mixing, asphalt old material recycling, stabilized soil mixing, filling, rush repair detection, municipal sanitation, and other maintenance equipment. The company provides its products for use in the fields of energy conservation, environment protection, and resource recycling. It also exports its products to approximately 20 countries and regions in Europe, Asia, and Africa. Anshan Senyuan Road and Bridge Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Anshan, China.

300643.SZ.summary: Hamaton Automotive Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and supplies various products to automotive industry worldwide. It offers TPMS systems, maintenance tools, parts, and sensors; commercial car, passenger car, tank, and tube valves, as well as valve extensions and valve parts; tire gauges comprising ruler, dial, and digital gauges; and tire repair, valve maintenance, and tire inflation tools. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

600066.SS.summary: Yutong Bus Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of busses in China. It offers city and intercity buses, coaches, school buses, airfield bus, and special vehicles, as well as e-vehicles. The company is also involved in the import and export trade business; production and sale of automotive parts and air conditioners; provision of tourist passenger, property, transportation, warehousing, and rental services; sale of automotive and accessories; real estate development and management; asset operations and investment management; and development and sale of software. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 200 chartered service stations and 320 authorized service outlets. The company was formerly known as Zhengzhou Yutong Bus Co., Ltd. Yutong Bus Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Zhengzhou, China.

600104.SS.summary: SAIC Motor Corporation Limited researches and develops, produces, and sells passenger and commercial vehicles in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company also engages in the promotion of commercialization of new-energy vehicles and Internet vehicles; implementation of technical research and industrialization exploration, such as intelligent driving; and research and development, production, and sale of spare parts, including power drive systems, chassis systems, interior and exterior decoration systems, and core components of new-energy vehicles, such as battery, electronic drive and power electronics, and intelligent products systems. In addition, it is involved in the auto service and trading business comprising logistics, auto e-commerce, mobility, energy-saving, and recharging services; automobile-related finance, insurance, and investment businesses; international commerce and trade businesses; and industry big data and artificial intelligence fields deployment activities. Further, the company is involved in the equity and venture capital investment, industrial consulting, property management, industrial investment, asset management, investment management, storage service, and publishing businesses, as well as hospitality, beverage, and catering services business. Additionally, it develops and operates real estate properties; and manufactures and sells electricity-controlled burning oil product and engineering machinery. The company is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China. SAIC Motor Corporation Limited operates as a subsidiary of Shanghai Automotive Industry Corporation (Group).

600166.SS.summary: Beiqi Foton Motor Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells commercial vehicles worldwide. The company offers passenger vehicles, such as vans, pickups, and SUVs; light-duty trucks; medium and heavy-duty trucks; and buses and coaches. It also provides Total Care, parts, and financing services. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

600213.SS.long_name: Yangzhou Yaxing Motor Coach Co., Ltd.
600213.SS.summary: Yangzhou Yaxing Motor Coach Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells coaches in China. It offers intercity, school, high-end tour, and urban buses, as well as city and special buses; private coaches; luxury limos; special vehicles; and other environment-friendly and energy-saving buses under the Asiastar, FTBCI, and Yangtze brand names. The company also exports its products to Europe, North America, Australia, Southeast Asia, Russia, the Middle East, Africa, and other countries. Yangzhou Yaxing Motor Coach Co., Ltd. was founded in 1949 and is based in Yangzhou, China.

600303.SS.long_name: Liaoning SG Automotive Group Co., Ltd.
600303.SS.summary: Liaoning SG Automotive Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automobiles, axles, and components in China. The company offers city, coach, school, commuter, city feeder, electric, and hybrid buses; SUVs, CUVs, and pickup trucks; and special vehicles, including container transporters, warehouse gate semi-trailers, gate semi-trailers, multipurpose fire engines, and van products. It also provides sedan chassis products, light-duty axles, and heavy-duty axles, as well as components, including slip yokes, pinion flanges, gears, tubes, steering knuckles, various types of shaft, hollow axle shafts, axle shafts for rear drive axles, stub axle shafts for front drive axles, split-type Diff cases, and carrier housings. The company offers its vehicles under the Huanghai brand, and axles and components under the SG brand. Liaoning SG Automotive Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Dandong, China.

600418.SS.summary: Anhui Jianghuai Automobile Group Corp.,Ltd. manufactures and sells commercial vehicles and passenger cars in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers light, medium, and heavy-duty trucks; vans; sedans; IEVs; SUVs; MPVs; SRVs; pick-ups; bus chassis; engineering machinery; gearboxes; and engines, as well as electric vehicles. It exports its products to South America, Europe, Africa, Asia, and other regions. The company was formerly known as Anhui Jianghuai Automobile Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Anhui Jianghuai Automobile Group Corp.,Ltd. in November 2016. Anhui Jianghuai Automobile Group Corp.,Ltd. was founded in 1964 and is based in Hefei, the People's Republic of China.

600565.SS.summary: DIMA HOLDINGS Co. ,Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of special vehicles in China. It offers bulletproof cash trucks, communication command vehicles, emergency communication vehicles, professional work vehicles, logistics support vehicles, radio and television work vehicles, and mobile police cars. The company also exports its vehicles. DIMA HOLDINGS Co. ,Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Chongqing, China.

600609.SS.summary: Shenyang Jinbei Automotive Company Limited engages in the development, manufacture, and distribution of automobiles and automobile spare parts in China. It offers light trucks and automobile spare parts under the Jinbei brand name. The company also distributes its products to Brazil, Malaysia, the Philippines, Vietnam, and others. Shenyang Jinbei Automotive Company Limited is headquartered in Shenyang, China.

600733.SS.long_name: BAIC BluePark New Energy Technology Co., Ltd.
600733.SS.summary: BAIC BluePark New Energy Technology Co.,Ltd. provides smart travel solutions in China and internationally. The company offers intelligent networked electric vehicles, charging and replacing services, and time-sharing leasing services, as well as vehicle maintenance and repair, and life-cycle butler services. BAIC BluePark New Energy Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is based in Beijing, China.

600877.SS.summary: CETC Energy Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells motorcycles and its engines primarily in the People's Republic of China. It offers street bikes, cub motorcycles, off-road motorcycles, scooters, cargo and passenger tricycles, special motorcycles, chopper motorcycles, and ATV quads. It also provides motorcycle engines; plastic and aspherical optical lens; general machinery components; and generators. The company sells its products primarily under the JiaLing and Traxx brands; and exports its products to approximately 90 countries and regions. The company was formerly known as China Jialing Industrial Co., Ltd. (Group) and changed its name to CETC Energy Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. in August 2019. The company was founded in 1875 and is based in Chongqing, the People's Republic of China. CETC Energy Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China South Industry Corporation.

601127.SS.long_name: Chongqing Sokon Industry Group Stock Co.,Ltd.
601127.SS.summary: Chongqing Sokon Industry Group Stock Co.,Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, sells, and services automobiles, and related engines and components in China and internationally. It offers small-displacement automotive powertrains and related systematic solutions; and seats, front and rear bumpers, interior parts, and shock absorber products. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Chongqing, China. Chongqing Sokon Industry Group Stock Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Chongqing Sokon Holding Co.Ltd.

601238.SS.summary: Guangzhou Automobile Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of vehicles and motorcycles, and parts and components; and provision of commercial and financial services in Mainland China and Hong Kong. The company operates through two segments, Vehicles and Related Operations, and Others. It offers large to medium sized passenger vehicles, light and heavy trucks, construction vehicles, and energy vehicles; motorcycles comprising standard motorcycles, sport bikes, scooters, etc.; and auto-parts and components, including engines, gearboxes, car seats, HVAC systems, auto lamps, automation accessories, redirectors, shock absorbers, and accessories. The company also provides financial investment, insurance, insurance broker, financial lease, automobile credit, and other related services; and engages in the businesses of vehicle sales, logistics, international trading, second-hand vehicles, disassembling, resources recycling, supporting services, etc. In addition, it offers investment management services; and engages in the trade of steel. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China. Guangzhou Automobile Group Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Guangzhou Automobile Industry Group Co., Ltd.

601777.SS.summary: Lifan Technology (group) Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of automobiles, motorcycles, and engines in China. The company offers motorcycle, automobile, and general-purpose gasoline engines. It also researches, develops, produces, and sells new energy products, including lead acid and lithium batteries; cars, SUVs, and MPVs; and assisted cars, curved beam cars, knight cars, prince cars, off-road vehicles, ATVs, and large displacement cars. Lifan Technology (group) Co.,Ltd offers its products under the Lifan brand. It also exports its products. Lifan Technology (group) Co.,Ltd was formerly known as Lifan Industry (Group) Co., Ltd and changed its name to Lifan Technology (group) Co.,Ltd in March 2021. Lifan Technology (group) Co.,Ltd was founded in 1992 and is based in Chongqing, China.

603178.SS.long_name: Ningbo Shenglong Automotive Powertrain System Co., Ltd.
603178.SS.summary: Ningbo Shenglong Automotive Powertrain System Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive powertrain systems in China and internationally. It offers variable displacement oil pumps, tandem vacuum/variable displacement oil pumps, start/stop pumps, fixed displacement engine and transmission pumps, and high pressure DCT and brake system pumps; and assembly, traditional, and hollow camshafts, as well as aluminum die castings. The company is based in Ningbo, China.

BMCLF.summary: BAIC Motor Corporation Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells passenger vehicles in the People's Republic of China. The company provides luxury passenger cars, luxury commercial vehicles, middle-end and high-end passenger cars, and self-owned passenger cars, as well as electric passenger cars. It also provides auto engines, and powertrain and other parts and components. The company sells its products under the Beijing Brand, Beijing Benz, Beijing Hyundai, and Fujian Benz names. It is also involved in the car financing and automobile after-sales businesses, as well as investment management business. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

BY6.F.summary: BYD Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of automobiles and related products worldwide. It operates through three segments: Rechargeable Battery and Photovoltaic Products; Mobile Handset Components and Assembly Service; and Automobiles and Related Products. The company offers internal combustion, hybrid, and battery-electric passenger vehicles; buses, coaches, and taxis; logistics, construction, and sanitation vehicles; and vehicles for warehousing, port, airport, and mining operations. It also manufactures and sells lithium-ion and nickel batteries, photovoltaic products, and iron batteries primarily for mobile phones, electric tools, and other portable electronic instruments; mobile handset components, such as housings and keypads; and automobiles, and auto-related molds and components, as well as provides assembly, and automobiles leasing and after sales services. In addition, it offers rail transit equipment; consumer electronics; and solar batteries and arrays, as well as involved in the urban rail transportation business. BYD Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

BYD Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

D4D.F.summary: Dongfeng Motor Group Company Limited manufactures and sells commercial vehicles, passenger vehicles, and engines and parts in the People's Republic of China. It operates in four segments: Commercial Vehicles, Passenger Vehicles, Financing Service, and Corporate and Others. It provides commercial vehicles, including trucks and buses; passenger vehicles comprising basic passenger cars, MPVs, and SUVs; electric vehicles, off-road vehicles, and special commercial vehicles; and other automobile related products. The company also provides financial services. In addition, it markets and sells automobiles. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China. Dongfeng Motor Group Company Limited is a subsidiary of Dongfeng Motor Corporation.

DNFGF.summary: Dongfeng Motor Group Company Limited manufactures and sells commercial vehicles, passenger vehicles, and engines and parts in the People's Republic of China. It operates in four segments: Commercial Vehicles, Passenger Vehicles, Financing Service, and Corporate and Others. It provides commercial vehicles, including trucks and buses; passenger vehicles comprising basic passenger cars, MPVs, and SUVs; electric vehicles, off-road vehicles, and special commercial vehicles; and other automobile related products. The company also provides financial services. In addition, it markets and sells automobiles. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China. Dongfeng Motor Group Company Limited is a subsidiary of Dongfeng Motor Corporation.

DNFGY.summary: Dongfeng Motor Group Company Limited manufactures and sells commercial vehicles, passenger vehicles, and engines and parts in the People's Republic of China. It operates in four segments: Commercial Vehicles, Passenger Vehicles, Financing Service, and Corporate and Others. It provides commercial vehicles, including trucks and buses; passenger vehicles comprising basic passenger cars, MPVs, and SUVs; electric vehicles, off-road vehicles, and special commercial vehicles; and other automobile related products. The company also provides financial services. In addition, it markets and sells automobiles. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China. Dongfeng Motor Group Company Limited is a subsidiary of Dongfeng Motor Corporation.

GNZUF.summary: Guangzhou Automobile Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of vehicles and motorcycles, and parts and components; and provision of commercial and financial services in Mainland China and Hong Kong. The company operates through two segments, Vehicles and Related Operations, and Others. It offers large to medium sized passenger vehicles, light and heavy trucks, construction vehicles, and energy vehicles; motorcycles comprising standard motorcycles, sport bikes, scooters, etc.; and auto-parts and components, including engines, gearboxes, car seats, HVAC systems, auto lamps, automation accessories, redirectors, shock absorbers, and accessories. The company also provides financial investment, insurance, insurance broker, financial lease, automobile credit, and other related services; and engages in the businesses of vehicle sales, logistics, international trading, second-hand vehicles, disassembling, resources recycling, supporting services, etc. In addition, it offers investment management services; and engages in the trade of steel. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China. Guangzhou Automobile Group Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Guangzhou Automobile Industry Group Co., Ltd.

GRV.F.summary: Great Wall Motor Company Limited researches and develops, manufactures, markets, and sells automobiles, and automotive parts and components in China, South Africa, Ecuador, Chile, Russia, Saudi Arabia, and internationally. The company offers pick-up trucks, SUVs, sedans, and energy vehicles primarily under the Haval, WEY, Great Wall Pickup, and ORA brand names; and unmanned vehicles. It also provides auto molds; new energy vehicle transmission and electric drive system; repairs automobiles; and transports general goods, as well as truck transportation services. In addition, the company offers investment and financing, buildings rental, logistics, business information consultation, scrap car recycling and dismantling, finance leasing, real estate, technology information and development, and trade consultation, warehousing, international trade, financial guarantee, and after-sales services, as well as automotive technology research, development, and technical consultation services. Further, it processes, recycles, and sells waste and used materials; and sells lubricants. Additionally, the company engages in the wholesale and retail of car accessories. It also exports its products. Great Wall Motor Company Limited was formerly known as Baoding Great Wall Motor Company Limited and changed its name to Great Wall Motor Company Limited in May 2003. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Baoding, China. Great Wall Motor Company Limited is a subsidiary of Baoding Innovation Great Wall Asset Management Company Limited.

L87A.F.summary: Li Auto Inc., through its subsidiaries, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells smart electric sport utility vehicles (SUVs) in China. It offers Li ONE, a six-seat electric SUV that equipped with a range of extension system and smart vehicle solutions. The company was formerly known as Leading Ideal Inc. and changed its name to Li Auto Inc. in July 2020. Li Auto Inc. was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

LI.summary: Li Auto Inc., through its subsidiaries, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells smart electric sport utility vehicles (SUVs) in China. It offers Li ONE, a six-seat electric SUV that equipped with a range of extension system and smart vehicle solutions. The company was formerly known as Leading Ideal Inc. and changed its name to Li Auto Inc. in July 2020. Li Auto Inc. was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

N3IA.F.summary: NIO Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells smart electric vehicles in Mainland China, Hong Kong, the United States, the United Kingdom, and Germany. The company offers five, six, and seven-seater electric SUVs, as well as smart electric sedans. It is also involved in the provision of energy and service packages to its users; marketing, design, and technology development activities; manufacture of e-powertrains, battery packs, and components; and sales and after sales management activities. In addition, the company offers power solutions, including Power Home, a home charging solution; Power Swap, a battery swapping service; Public Charger, a public fast charging solution; Power Mobile, a mobile charging service through charging vans; Power Map, an application that provides access to a network of public chargers and their real-time information; and One Click for Power valet service, where it offers vehicle pick up, charging, and return services. Further, it provides repair, maintenance, and bodywork services through its NIO service centers and authorized third-party service centers; statutory and third-party liability insurance, and vehicle damage insurance through third-party insurers; courtesy car services; and roadside assistance, as well as data packages; and auto financing services. Additionally, the company offers NIO Certified, an used vehicle inspection, evaluation, acquisition, and sales service. NIO Inc. has a strategic collaboration with Mobileye N.V. for the development of automated and autonomous vehicles for consumer markets. The company was formerly known as NextEV Inc. and changed its name to NIO Inc. in July 2017. NIO Inc. was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

NIO.summary: NIO Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells smart electric vehicles in Mainland China, Hong Kong, the United States, the United Kingdom, and Germany. The company offers five, six, and seven-seater electric SUVs, as well as smart electric sedans. It is also involved in the provision of energy and service packages to its users; marketing, design, and technology development activities; manufacture of e-powertrains, battery packs, and components; and sales and after sales management activities. In addition, the company offers power solutions, including Power Home, a home charging solution; Power Swap, a battery swapping service; Public Charger, a public fast charging solution; Power Mobile, a mobile charging service through charging vans; Power Map, an application that provides access to a network of public chargers and their real-time information; and One Click for Power valet service, where it offers vehicle pick up, charging, and return services. Further, it provides repair, maintenance, and bodywork services through its NIO service centers and authorized third-party service centers; statutory and third-party liability insurance, and vehicle damage insurance through third-party insurers; courtesy car services; and roadside assistance, as well as data packages; and auto financing services. The company was formerly known as NextEV Inc. and changed its name to NIO Inc. in July 2017. NIO Inc. was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

NIU.summary: Niu Technologies designs, manufactures, and sells smart electric-scooters in the People's Republic of China. The company offers NQi, MQi, UQi, and Gova series e-scooters; RQi and TQi series urban commuter electric motorcycles; NIU Aero series professional mountain and road bicycles; and NIU kick-scooter series kick-scooter and other micro-mobility solutions under the NIU brand name. It also provides scooter accessories, such as raincoats, gloves, knee pads, storage baskets and tail boxes, smart phone holders, backrests, and locks; lifestyle accessories, which includes T-shirts, coats, jeans, hats, bags, jewelry, notebook, badges, key chain, and mugs; and performance upgrade components that comprises of upgraded wheels, shock absorbers, brake calipers, and carbon fiber body panels. In addition, the company, through its NIU app, offers online repair request, DIY repairs, service station locator, theft reporting, and smart services, as well as NIU cover, which provides insurance services; NIU Care that offers maintenance service and reserve service in offline service stations; and NIU Wash offers free wash coupon on a monthly basis. The company sells and services its products through city partners and franchised stores, and third-party e-commerce platforms and the company's online store. As of December 31, 2020, it operated through 246 city partners and 1,616 franchised stores in approximately 199 cities in the People's Republic of China; and 36 distributors in 46 countries internationally. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

XPEV.summary: XPeng Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and markets smart electric vehicles in the People's Republic of China. It offers SUVs under the G3 name; and four-door sports sedan under the P7 name. The company also provides sales contract, maintenance, super charging, vehicle leasing, and ride-hailing services. XPeng Inc. was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China.
